issue.title: [Java] Enable allocator logging in CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18035](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18035). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This would help track down certain flaky tests.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18035?focusedCommentId=17623224) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Basically: if we leak memory in a test, we should print the history for the leaked buffers and such so we can actually tell what failed
